javelin.view.screen.upgrading

Class UpgradingScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • tyrant.mikera.tyrant.TPanel
            • tyrant.mikera.tyrant.Screen
              • javelin.view.screen.InfoScreen
                • javelin.view.screen.town.SelectScreen
                  • javelin.view.screen.upgrading.UpgradingScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcademyScreen, TownUpgradingScreen

    public abstract class UpgradingScreen
extends SelectScreen
    Lets a plear Upgrade members from a Squad. Upgrading 1 level (100XP) should take 1 week and cost $50.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • completetraining

        public static Squad completetraining(TrainingOrder memberp,
                                     WorldPlace p,
                                     Combatant member)
        Applies the upgrade and adjustments.
        Parameters:
        memberp - Training information.
        member - Joins a nearby Squad or becomes a new one.
        p - Place the training was realized.
        member - Member to be returned (upgraded or not, in case of cancel).
        Returns:
        The Squad the trainee is now into.
